about_the_game:
Welcome to our Relaxing Simulator, a unique experience designed to calm the senses, relax the mind, and nurture the soul. In a hectic world where stress and hustle are omnipresent, our game offers an oasis of serenity and tranquility.

Immerse yourself in an immersive environment filled with natural beauty. Each location has been carefully crafted to create an atmosphere of relaxation and peace. Listen to the soothing sounds and enjoy the surroundings. Interact with objects as needed to view, turn on, or open them.



Our game offers relaxing activities aimed at calming the mind and relaxing the body. Explore locations in the virtual world to establish a deeper connection with yourself.



Our aim is to create a digital sanctuary where players can take a break from the stresses of everyday life. With a harmonious combination of visual aesthetics, relaxing music, and soothing activities, we invite players to leave the hustle and bustle of life behind and immerse themselves in the world of inner peace. Welcome to our Relaxing Simulator - a place where relaxation and rejuvenation take center stage.



Features:
- Experience complete freedom in first-person perspective to move around freely.
- Enjoy the surroundings with music or ambient sounds.
- There are 8 different environments available.
- Interact with objects, furniture, and doors to actively explore the world.
- Set the time of day to create the desired atmosphere in your surroundings. You can also watch the sunrise and sunset.

Highlights:
- Earn numerous achievements through diverse challenges.
- A global leaderboard to showcase how long you've enjoyed your tranquility.

More:
- You love this game and want additional environments to relax in. Share your ideas in the CommunityHUB and let's talk about them together.

Note:
This experimental project offers you a digital sanctuary. The game has no story, no characters, no running or jumping or anything like that. You move forward standing and running and are located on mini-maps.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game contains some adult content. This includes depictions of alcohol bottles, tobacco products, weapons, statues with naked figures and skeletons. These elements are purely visual and cannot be consumed or used. They merely serve to create the atmosphere of the game. We recommend that the game is only played by people of the appropriate age and that parents or guardians check the content in advance. Thank you for your understanding.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 - 64Bit
  • Processor: 4 Cores or better (Example Ryzen 3 o. Intel Core i3)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Vram or better (Example AMD RX 580 o. Nvidia GTX 970)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 - 64Bit
  • Processor: 6 Cores or better (Example Ryzen 5 o. Intel Core i5)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB Vram or better (Example AMD RX VEGA 64 o. Nvidia GTX 1080)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
